extension.name: Facebook SqueezePage display on site entry
extension.author: Berthold
extension.description: This plugin enables you to display a squeeze page to like the website Facebook page when a user enter the website

field.name: system
field.label: Reset
field.description: Reset the popup's timer for your web browser

field.name: interval
field.label: Number of days before displaying again the popup
field.description: Number of days before displaying again the popup

field.name: moduleid
field.label: Id of a module to display
field.description: Number associated to a module in the database

field.name: delaytimer
field.label: Timer
field.description: Delay (in seconds) before showing the squeeze page

field.name: hidetimer
field.label: Delay
field.description: Delay (in seconds) after the squeeze page is automatically hidden (0 = never hide automatically)

field.name: boxwidth
field.label: SqueezePage width
field.description: Set the width of the box in this area

field.name: boxheight
field.label: SqueezePage height
field.description: Set the height of the box in this area

field.name: dispmobile
field.label: Display on mobile
field.description: Do you want the squeezepage to be displayed on mobiles as well?
